Text: It should be up and running, if it does not work, please leave a comment.

I have to write something or else... Nice effort, but what's the idea of putting together a faawking big RAR file that downloads at less than 5 ko/S, which uTorrent says should be in in about 12 weeks from now; we are lucky this page says 24 seeders!!!

OK I admit I was a little severe. It downloaded in less than 48 hours. But you have to admit that it is still a long wait if you only want some titles or authors. Good job; I will enjoy sorting them all
